wytr.area.EmeraldTrail.desc:
The trail through Nivla Woods to Detlas, the central
city of the Wynn Province.
wytr.area.NivlaWoods.desc:
This forest has been infested with giant, mutant
arachnids for countless years. They serve as the
greatest obstacle for adventurers on their way to
Detlas.
wytr.area.AlekinVillage.desc:
A small village hidden within the trees in Nivla Woods.
It acts as a respite for travelers, as the midpoint
between Ragni and Detlas.
wytr.area.DetlasSuburbs.desc:
This area is heavily defended by the armies of Detlas
and Ragni to ensure food production continues.
wytr.area.Maltic.desc:
The first town founded by Villagers in the Wynn
province. Maltic's beach is the site of a shipwreck
that crashed upon its shores 100 years ago.
wytr.area.BlackRoad.desc:
This road leads to the town of Ternaves and its nearby
mine. It is inhabited by strange mushroom-cow hybrids,
and a mysterious scientist.
wytr.area.PigmensRavine.desc:
This massive, maze-like ravine is home to the Pigmen, a
species of half-pig, half-human abominations that feast
on any weak adventurer who happens to stumble inside.
wytr.area.Elkurn.desc:
Despite its proximity to the portal, this quaint town
has somehow managed to survive. Its placement near two
separate magical phenomena has led to an influx of
scientific minds to the area.
wytr.area.RoosterIsland.desc:
This egg-shaped island is home to a single resident, a
featherbrained villager hermit obsessed over chickens.
Rumor has it that Bob has visited the island for some
reason.
wytr.area.AncientNemract.desc:
Hundreds of years ago, the original stone city of
Nemract was ravaged by a swarm of the undead. Now it is
only inhabited by the corpses of those who died that
day.
wytr.area.Savannah.desc:
Wild ocelots inhabit this mostly-barren savannah, which
leads to the Almuj desert. There is a town on the edge
of the mountains, though few visit it.
wytr.area.TimeValley.desc:
The ruins here have been present longer than the
portal. Only one person alive today understands this
strange place. Time acts strangely here and it's
apparent that whoever made them were not human.
wytr.area.Selchar.desc:
Founded in 970 AP after the waves calmed, this city
became the bridge between Gavel and Wynn. It flourishes
in trade and enjoys a safe haven from the dangers of
both provinces.
wytr.area.RootsofCorruption.desc:
A thousand years ago, a group of emerald miners
unearthed a mysterious portal. Unknowingly, they doomed
the province to centuries of war against the mysterious
force known as corruption.
wytr.area.PiratesBay.desc:
A massive pirate ship crashed here with such severity,
the hull was moulded into the cliffside. Some say that
there is still treasure hidden inside.
wytr.area.AlmujGreatRiver.desc:
Despite its barren surroundings, this river has
sprouted various plant life. It flows straight into the
Rymek Canyon.
wytr.area.WynnExcavationSiteA.desc:
WynnExcavation is a Gavel-owned company dedicated to
uncovering the history of the Wynn Province. Here,
they've uncovered an ancient tomb from a lost empire.
wytr.area.InvadedBarracks.desc:
Once the barracks of the Almuj Army, it has been taken
over by the traitorous rebel, Commander Takan.
wytr.area.OwlTribe.desc:
The Owl Tribe is one of the two native tribes of the
Rymek Canyon. They have been at war with the Eagle
Tribe for years.
wytr.area.EagleTribe.desc:
The Eagle Tribe is one of the two native tribes of the
Rymek Canyon. They have been at war with the Owl Tribe
for years.
wytr.area.AbandonedLumberYard.desc:
Hundreds of years ago, the people working at this mill
died in the war. Even after the land was frozen over,
their bodies still hunt those who draw near.
wytr.area.GavelGate.desc:
This massive doorway serves as the main entrance to the
province of Gavel. Through it lies the quartz city of
Llevigar.
wytr.area.TowerofAscension.desc:
The tallest tower in the province, the Tower of
Ascension provides a challenge so daunting that it has
brought down even the strongest of warriors.
wytr.area.IceIslands.desc:
Home to a nation of early seafarers, they have waged
war among each other for years, oblivious to the real
war happening on the mainland.
wytr.area.WynnExcavationSiteB.desc:
No one knows what WynnExcavation is searching for at
Site B, but rumors are circulating that they are trying
to uncover something ancient and powerful.
wytr.area.TheHouseofTwain.desc:
Once the home of the most gifted defenders of Wynn, it
now lies in ruins and haunted by the spirits that could
not move on.
wytr.area.BobsTomb.desc:
A year after Bob's disappearance, a tomb pertaining to
the resting place of Bob was found in 985 AP.
wytr.area.LightForestGate.desc:
This serves as the gateway to the brilliant Light
Forest. Unlike the Dark Forest, this area hasn't been
afflicted by the Decay, and remains as beautiful as
ever.
wytr.area.TheQiraHive.desc:
This towering nest is the Qira Hive, a challenge
against the powerful creations of the enigmatic Qira.
wytr.area.OzothsSpire.desc:
Tainted by the flames, this spire serves as the
dramatic trail up to the nest of the dragon herself,
Ozoth.
wytr.area.GyliaWatchTower.desc:
Founded after the Gerten War 200 years ago, the Gylia
Watch have used this tower as their base, keeping an
eye on the Gerts to prevent another attack.
wytr.area.KitriosBarracks.desc:
These barracks are where the Cinfras Army is
positioned, though lately their General has been acting
suspicious...
wytr.area.Thesead.desc:
Thesead is one of the more isolated cities of Gavel,
but its coal industry has kept it thriving. However,
recently the coal mines have been ridden with an
unusual gas.
wytr.area.CrystalFalls.desc:
The elegant Crystal Falls decorate the scenery around
the dojo of Sensei Miyagi, a wise teacher who has
trained hundreds of apprentices.
wytr.area.Eltom.desc:
The city of Eltom is the only human residence in Gavel.
Since humans aren't permitted to settle in the
province, it has remained hidden to outsiders.
wytr.area.LegendaryIsland.desc:
Home of the Legendary Challenge, a test for those who
think that they are the strongest in the world. It is
named for its designer, the eccentric Dr. Legendary.
wytr.area.KandonBeda.desc:
A town built on the edge of a cliff, Kandon-Beda
specializes in air travel. It also houses a library for
those who wish to learn history.
